name: Demon Hunter 5: Ascendance
description: You slump into your chair after another day of investigations. Just as you start to lose yourself in the glow of the TV screen, the telephone rings. The museum curator needs your help - a tourist has gone missing. You smirk at his warning of paranormal goings-on; that's what Demon Hunters are for.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space
